message.entry: This block does not support double or single-precision data types. These types may be introduced by the 'Data type override' parameter in the Fixed-Point Tool. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit"> <cmd>fxptui.setDTOValueOnModel(gcs,'ScaledDouble')</cmd> <txt>To observe floating-point behavior, override data types with Scaled doubles.</txt> </action> <action type="fixit"> <cmd>fxptui.setDTOValueOnModel(gcs,'ForceOff')</cmd> <txt>Remove data type override from the model.</txt> </action> </actions>
At least one port must be connected in block {0}
All input data to block {0} must be of the same dimensions
All input data to block {0} must be of the same data type
The Write AVI file block does not support code generation - no file will be created
